short_summary: Transport Canada has a requirement to purchase one (1) new lift height electric order picker and ancillary items
description: The project requires a vehicle lift. The selection criteria for the proposal is the lowest price. This is a conditionally limited tendering opportunity for suppliers of Canadian goods.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Title
Lift Height Electric Order Picker

#### Reference Number
WS3523693890-Doc3628312335

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Solicitation Number
WS3523693890

#### Published Date
2022-11-22

#### Closing Date
2023-01-12T14:00:00 EST

#### Amendment Date
2023-01-09

#### Tender Status
Expired

### Procurement Information

#### Goods or Services
Vehicle lift (UNSPSC 24101661)

#### Procurement Category
Goods (GD)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering

#### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreement
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Person
Sherline Pieris (SPAC/PSPC)
sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Requirement

Transport Canada seeks to purchase one (1) new lift height electric order picker and ancillary items. Suppliers must provide Canadian goods.

#### Mandatory Requirements

* Bid submission and supporting documentation must be submitted on January 12, 2023, by 1400 EST.
* Any bid submitted after 1400 EST will be declared non-responsive.
